review: Works great for my kids rooms :)
author: Laura Nye

review: The Fire Stick does work on monitors with only a DVI port. You have to use an active HDMI to DVI converter (one with power). It does not work with a passive adapter. A converter averages about $30 which is still cheaper than purchasing a new monitor or TV with built in HDMI. I use mine with my old 20 inch monitors to view my IP cameras.
author: BLKDRGN

review: I am not pleased with the fire stick and I want the money I spent on it put back in to my checking account please and thank you
